divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home from work on 435North. I'm not sure exactly what spot it happened off the top of my head but I was coming from Leawood and it looked to be coming from the left side of the highway. It was before I came to I70 but after the Bannister Rd exit I believe. The lights about 6 or so of them formed like a C - shape in the sky if you were to connect the dots. It proceeded to move across the highway as I got closer and then hovered on the right side of 435 as I passed. As it moved it looked like it changed shape and there were blue lights and white lights. It didn't appear at all to be a plane the shape wasn't like anything I've seen before.
Summary: On the way home going on 435North almost to kansas city exit and saw a formation of lights in the distance
trends: There have been 134 other sightings in Kansas City
There were 9 other sightings in Kansas City on or around October 3rd 2011
